title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally X review
description: The ROG Xbox Ally X is the newest handheld gaming device from Asus, and the third of its kind from the company in as many years. The Xbox Ally X, along with the cheaper Xbox Ally, is made in collaboration with Microsoft's Xbox division, and features a unique design that mirrors Xbox controllers, as well as ships with a lightly modified version of Windows 11.The Xbox Ally X that we are looking at here is based on AMD's latest generation Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme chip.
